definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: What will you do on Lantau Island?
sentences.chinese: 你將會在大嶼山做什麼？

sentences.english: The approval letter issued by Lands Department for construction of village house in south Lantau.
sentences.chinese: 地政總署批准在南大嶼山興建村屋之批准書。

sentences.english: Other documents to prove the genuine need to access closed roads in south Lantau.
sentences.chinese: 其他文件以證明有實際需要前往大嶼山封閉道路。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works in the Lantau South Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 於南大嶼山郊野公園內進行土木工事及建築工程。

sentences.english: I prayed to the buddha when I visited it with my friends a few days ago.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天帶朋友遊香港其中一站去了大嶼山看大佛。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works wholly in Lantau North Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 於北大嶼山郊野公園內進行挖泥工程及建築工程。

sentences.english: My friend told me that it was built to the north of Lantan Island .
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友告訴我它建在大嶼山的北邊。

sentences.english: The Lantau Closed Road Permit is non-transferable.
sentences.chinese: 大嶼山封閉道路通行許可證不得轉讓。

sentences.english: The excavation at Man Kok Tsui on Lantau Island in 1958.
sentences.chinese: 圖示一九五八年在大嶼山萬角咀的考古發掘遺址。

sentences.english: This is a New Territories taxi, I can only take you to Tsuen Wan MTR station.
sentences.chinese: 這輛是大嶼山的士，我只能送你到東湧地鐵站。

sentences.english: The Lantau Closed Road Permit may be revoked at any time.
sentences.chinese: 大嶼山封閉道路通行許可證可隨時註銷作廢。

sentences.english: Jardine Ambassadors attend an orientation camp on Lantau Island.
sentences.chinese: 怡和親善大使參加在大嶼山舉行的夏日迎新營。

definition: Saigon, capital of former South Vietnam/Sai Kung town in New Territories, Hong Kong
Sierra Leone (Tw)/Shizishan or Lion Mountain/Shizishan district of Tongling city 銅陵市|铜陵市[Tong2 ling2 shi4], Anhui
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
